tasks.label: build_xudpserver_test_and_launch_lldbserver
tasks.command: cargo test --no-run --test xudpserver_test --package xsio && sudo bash -c 'T=$(ls -t target/debug/deps/xudpserver_test-* | head -n1); ln -sf "$PWD/$T" tools/debug/xudpserver_test-latest; sudo debug/lldb-server platform --server --listen "*:54321"'
